snippet.title: To clean up coal, Obama pushes more oil production

To clean up coal, Obama pushes more oil production
By The Associated Press 10:14 AM EST 12/23/13
Obama pumps over $1B into using carbon to extract oil for uncertain environmental benefits

snippet.title: LNG Exports: The $35 Billion Bull Invading Canada
snippet.description:
LNG Exports: The $35 Billion Bull Invading Canada
By Resource Investing News 10:36 PM EDT 10/10/13
In a remarkable interview with The Energy Report, Jason Sawatzky reveals the hottest new thing happening in the North America oil exploration and production space: the rush by major oil and gas firms to build LNG export facilities on Canada's West Coast. The AltaCorp Capital analyst points out that major oil and gas firms are not the only way to play west coast LNG development, and investors should look very closely at Canadian oilfield services. The capital flowing into west coast LNG is pumping up growth in the oilfield services industry too, with plenty of black gold to spread around.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12067633/1/lng-exports-the-35-billion-bull-invading-canada.html

snippet.title: BP's Leaking Well In 'Static' Condition
snippet.description:
BP's Leaking Well In 'Static' Condition
By Joseph Woelfel 04:27 AM EDT 08/04/10
BP's leaking well in the Gulf of Mexico has been plugged with heavy drilling mud, a 'significant milestone,' the company said.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10826337/1/bps-leaking-well-in-static-condition.html

BP's busted well in the Gulf of Mexico is close to being plugged for good.

snippet.title: BP: Cement Plug Has Hardened
snippet.description:
BP: Cement Plug Has Hardened
By TheStreet Staff 05:15 PM EDT 08/08/10
The oil company says the cement plug blocking its broken Gulf of Mexico oil well has hardened, paving the way for final drilling of a relief well.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10830303/1/bp-cement-plug-has-hardened.html

snippet.title: Oil Spill: BP's 'Static Kill and Drill' Plan
snippet.description:
Oil Spill: BP's 'Static Kill and Drill' Plan
By Eric Rosenbaum 12:31 PM EDT 08/02/10
BP is preparing to launch its static kill operation on Monday, with tests to be conducted and the actual operation tried as early as Tuesday. The static kill will be the first of a two-pronged effort from BP to permanently plug the compromised Macondo well.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10770971/1/oil-spill-bps-static-kill-and-drill-plan.html
